references.reason: Langchain is a framework for developing applications powered by large language models, and its relevance is indicated by its use in the Stylus retriever.

references.paper_title: Adaptersoup: Weight averaging to improve generalization of pretrained language models
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of adapter merging, a key technique used in Stylus to combine multiple adapters effectively.

references.paper_title: An image is worth one word: Personalizing text-to-image generation using textual inversion
references.reason: This paper introduces textual inversion, a technique used to customize text-to-image generation, which is closely related to the adapter-based approach used in Stylus.

references.paper_title: Concept sliders: Lora adaptors for precise control in diffusion models
references.reason: This paper focuses on LoRA adapters, which are the most popular approach used in Stylus and other open-source image generation tools.

references.paper_title: Lora: Low-rank adaptation of large language models
references.reason: This paper introduces LoRA, the low-rank adaptation technique that is the foundation of many fine-tuned adapters, a key component of Stylus.
